channel.title: Runecient 2007 Remake [459 Revision]
channel.description:
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://runecient.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img]
[B][URL=http://www.youtube.com/Runecient][IMG]http://www.youtube.com/favicon.ico[/img] YouTube[/URL][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [B] [URL=http://twitter.com/Runecient][IMG]http://www.theforce.net/2011/twitter_favicon.png[/img] Twitter[/URL][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=DarkOrange][B]All updates will be posted on the website! Make sure to follow it often as it is updated daily![/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] The [B][COLOR=red]red[/COLOR][/B] color code means the feature has not yet been started. The [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=#ff8c00][B]orange[/B] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]color code means the feature has been started and is under construction. The [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=#008000][B]green[/B] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]color code means the feature has been finished.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FmROR.png[/img][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3][B]Combat[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]PvP fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]PvN fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]NvN fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Every weapon special attack[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Equipment requirements[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Degradable equipment[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Weapon poisoning[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Magic[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every ancient combat spell[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Can't mage through walls[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Charge w/ godspells[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Weakening spells[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Bolt enchanting[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every other spell including:[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]
[ul][*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]B2b/B2p[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Charging staff heads[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Alching/Superheat[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]
[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Range[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT]
[ul][*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Bows/arrows[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Crossbows (the regular one and karil's)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can't shoot through walls[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]
[ul][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bQQmu.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Prayer[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]All bones bury-able[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR] [/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=#00FFFF][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QusJe.gif[/img] [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][SIZE=3][B]Mining[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE] [/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Emptying and refilling rocks[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All ores can be mined[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct pickaxe finding and animations[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Prospecting[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Smithing[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All bars can be made[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All bars can be forged into items[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All equipment can be produced[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Fishing[/B][/SIZE][/SIZE] [/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All fish can be caught[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct item requirements[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Fishing spots located all around the world[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Correct animations[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Cooking[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All fish can be cooked[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All meats can be cooked[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Grinding wheat into flour[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Cakes[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Pies[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Potatoes (with toppings)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Pizza[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Stew[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Drinks[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Dairy churn[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Gnome cooking[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Brew making[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Misc. cooking recepies[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct burning formula[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Cooking gauntlets[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Lumbridge cooking range bonus[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Eating food (in pieces)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UpykY.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Woodcutting[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Stumps and regrowing trees[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Correct hatchet finding[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Correct hatchet animations[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All trees cut-able[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Correct fell chance algorithms[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [SIZE=3][B]Firemaking[/B][/SIZE] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All logs light able[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Adding and depleting of lightened logs[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Colored fires[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]"Backward" firelighting[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Ashes appear after logs burn out[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animations[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Clipped[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YnmBh.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Agility[/SIZE][/B] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Gnome, Wilderness[/COLOR][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic], [/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Pyramid and Brimhaven courses usable[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All obstacles[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Force movement mask[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animations used[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wikM.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Herblore[/SIZE][/B] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animations[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Herb Identifying[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All potions can be made[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct first and secondary ingredients[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can pour doses into other potions (must be the same potion)[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KbkQ8.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Thieving[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE] [/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]NPC thievery working with correct stunning formula[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can thieve from stalls and can get caught by surrounding guards[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct animations and graphics used[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Crafting[/SIZE][/B][/SIZE] [/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Cutting gems[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Making amulets, necklaces, and rings[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Stringing amulets and necklaces[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Tanning normal, hard, and dragon hide[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Crafting normal, hard, and dragon hide[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Crafting snakeskin[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Spinning wool and flax[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Attaching studs[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Runecrafting[/SIZE][/B] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Use of the Abyss[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All altars working[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct multiple crafting[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Use of Pouches included[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Talismans "pull" to altars[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Tiaras enchanting[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Mixing runes[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I4pJ6.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Fletching [/SIZE][/B][/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All logs can be fletched[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Option interface for short or long bow (shafts if normal log)[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can string bows[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can make arrows[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Can cut gems into bolt tips[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OomYz.gif[/img][B] [SIZE=3]Slayer[/SIZE][/B] [/SIZE][/FONT] [list] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All slayer masters[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Very easy, easy, medium, hard and very hard slayer tasks[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Slayer gem working[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]All equipment working[/COLOR][/FONT] [*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct requirements for slayer monsters[/COLOR][/FONT] [/list] item.title: Runecient 2007 Remake [459 Revision]
item.dc:creator: @ricky-v ricky-v
item.description:
@ricky-v wrote:

[quote=“TheHolyGrail, post:14, topic:432525”]I am not jealous nor will I ever be. Take what I said as a word of advice, you really need to get the details if you plan on being succesfull.

For example, most, if not all, of your sendMessages are incorrect, aswell as your quest journal for Cook’s Assistant. “You fill your Watering can with water”… that isn’t even close to RuneScape’s message…[/quote]

Wasn’t me who programmed it but thanks for pointing it out.

On relation to the quest jornals I redid them today and added item on interface for rewards, will post pics soon

Read full topic

item.title: Runecient 2007 Remake [459 Revision]
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

I am not jealous nor will I ever be. Take what I said as a word of advice, you really need to get the details if you plan on being succesfull.

For example, most, if not all, of your sendMessages are incorrect, aswell as your quest journal for Cook’s Assistant. “You fill your Watering can with water”… that isn’t even close to RuneScape’s message…

item.title: Runecient 2007 Remake [459 Revision]
item.dc:creator: @ricky-v ricky-v
item.description:
@ricky-v wrote:

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]

YouTube[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]
Twitter[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]

[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=DarkOrange]All updates will be posted on the website! Make sure to follow it often as it is updated daily![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] The [COLOR=red]red[/COLOR] color code means the feature has not yet been started.
The [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=#ff8c00]orange [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]color code means the feature has been started and is under construction.
The [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2][COLOR=#008000]green [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2]color code means the feature has been finished.

[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3]Combat[/SIZE]
[/SIZE][/FONT]

[ul][][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]PvP fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]PvN fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]NvN fully complete[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Perfect max hit formulas[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Perfect accuracy formula[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Every weapon special attack[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Equipment effects (i.e. barrows)[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Equipment requirements[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Degradable equipment[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Weapon poisoning[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3]Magic[/SIZE]
[/SIZE][/FONT]

[ul][][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Every modern combat spell[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every ancient combat spell[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Can’t mage through walls[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Charge w/ godspells[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Iban blast/Slayer dart[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Weakening spells[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Bolt enchanting[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Teleblock/binding/freezing[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every other spell including:[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]

[ul][][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]B2b/B2p[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Charging staff heads[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Alching/Superheat[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Enchanting jewelry[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]

[FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3]Range[/SIZE]
[/SIZE][/FONT]

[ul][][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Bows/arrows[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Throwing weapons (knives, darts, javelins, throwing axes)[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Crossbows (the regular one and karil’s)[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Can’t shoot through walls[/COLOR][/FONT]
[*][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Ranged distances (9 steps for long range, 7 steps for normal)[/COLOR][/FONT][/ul]

[ul][FONT=Century Gothic][SIZE=2] [SIZE=3]Prayer[/SIZE]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
[list]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]All bones bury-able[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=green]Every prayer working properly[/COLOR]
[/FONT]

[/list]

[/FONT]

[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=orange]All ores can be mined[/COLOR][/FONT]

[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Prospecting[/COLOR][/FONT]
[][FONT=Century Gothic][COLOR=red]Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms[/COLOR][/FONT]
[/list]

[/SIZE][/FONT]

[/list]

[/FONT]
